mapper.insert: insert into tb_subtemp (subid, subname, usedyear, subkind, subsource, subtype, isoutschool, tid, asstid, status, subdirection, subsort, summary, content, requirement, refpapers, subprog) values (#{subid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usedyear,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{subkind,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{subsource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{subtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isoutschool,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{tid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{asstid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{subdirection,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{subsort,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{requirement,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{refpapers,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{subprog,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_subtemp set subname = #{subname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usedyear = #{usedyear,jdbcType=CHAR}, subkind = #{subkind,jdbcType=CHAR}, subsource = #{subsource,jdbcType=CHAR}, subtype = #{subtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, isoutschool = #{isoutschool,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=CHAR}, asstid = #{asstid,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, subdirection = #{subdirection,jdbcType=CHAR}, subsort = #{subsort,jdbcType=CHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, requirement = #{requirement,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, refpapers = #{refpapers,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, subprog = #{subprog,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where subid = #{subid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select subid, subname, usedyear, subkind, subsource, subtype, isoutschool, tid, asstid, status, subdirection, subsort, summary, content, requirement, refpapers, subprog from tb_subtemp where subid = #{subid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select subid, subname, usedyear, subkind, subsource, subtype, isoutschool, tid, asstid, status, subdirection, subsort, summary, content, requirement, refpapers, subprog from tb_subtemp
